Package org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.net

Class Summary
FTP Basic FTP client that performs the following actions: send - send files to a remote server.
MimeMail A task to send SMTP email.
TelnetTask Class to provide automated telnet protocol support for the Ant build tool
